name: The Dark Arrow
description:
This game was created for #WeeklyGameJam (Week 144 - Theme : In The Dark)

The objective of the game is to survive as long as you can, while gathering points.
Your weapon is a bow shooting an arrow that creates darkness, preventing you to see your surrondings for a set amount of time.

Controls:
WASD/ZQSD for movement (can be changed on the title screen)
Left Click to shoot
Right Click to dodgeroll

Also, please tell all your friends "horses are amazing". 
Thank you!!!
